main.error_connection: Error connecting to Lexon. The data is not updated.

select-action.attach-documents: Search the CENTINELA facilities and attach the files you need to your emails.

tab-archive.select-mail: Select one or more messages and save them in the CENTINELA documentation. Your location will be shown individually.

modal-archive.title: Store messages on CENTINELA
modal-archive.q1: What do you want to do with the selected messages?
modal-archive.q1b: Check which attachments you want to save
modal-archive.q3: In which implementation do you want to archive the selected messages?
modal-archive.modal-save-ko: There was an error saving files
modal-archive.author: Author
modal-archive.modal-progress: Sending documents to Centinela. Please, wait...

modal-attach.title: Attach files from CENTINELA
modal-attach.q1: Use the search engine or explore your implants to locate the files
modal-attach.q1b: Do a direct search for the files you want to attach
modal-attach.q1c: Or locate your files by exploring the implants
modal-attach.q3: In which implementation do you want to archive the selected messages?
modal-attach.modal-save-ok: The documents have been sent successfully
modal-attach.modal-save-ko: There was an error saving files
modal-attach.author: Author
